I am looking for a rental place in St. John, USA, under $4,000, so search for rental properties for me in St. John on the Redfin app.

Open App: Redfin
Click on point (572,209)
Type text:  St. John
Click on button with the function of "895. "
Click on button with the function of "3,650. "
Check status: successful

In the Amazon app, look for a washing machine with LG in the brand filter.

Click on button with the text "Filters (1)"
Click on button with the text "Brands"
Click on button with the text "LG"
Click on button with the text "Show 44 results"
Check status: successful

Show me some of the sustainability art pieces on the Pinterest app for my research on sustainable energy.

Open App: Pinterest
Click on button with the function of "Search, Tab"
Wait for response
Type text: sustainability art pieces
Click on button with the function of "Search"
Wait for response
Check status: successful
